sen.j: 娟子内親王（けんしないしんのう、長元5年9月13日 (旧暦)（1032年10月19日） - 康和5年3月12日 (旧暦)（1103年4月20日））は、第67代後朱雀天皇第二皇女。

sen.j: 父・後朱雀の即位と共に斎院に卜定され、長暦元年（1037年）4月13日 (旧暦)初斎院入。
sen.e: She became bokujo (to decide by fortunetelling) at the same time when her father, Emperor Gosuzaku succeeded to the throne, and entered into Shosaiin (Hall of Initial Abstinence) on April 13, 1037.

sen.j: この人事は姪の皇后禎子内親王と不仲だった藤原頼通が禎子内親王をくじくために娘を遠方に引き離す戦略だったと説明されることが多い。
sen.e: It was often described that it was FUJIWARA no Yorimichi's tactic to let Imperial Princess Teishi's daughter to go to the further place to take off her political power, since Yorimichi did not have good relationship with his nephew, Empress, Imperial Princess Teishi.

sen.j: だが、去ること長元4年（1031年）、当時の伊勢斎宮であった具平親王三女・せん子女王が酒乱に乗じて「ご託宣」と称し「斎宮の冷遇は天皇の失政」として非難した事件があった。
sen.e: However, there was an incident that Imperial Prince Tomohira's third daughter, Princess Senko, who was Ise Saigu (vestal virgin princess serving at Ise-jingu Shrine) at that time, had too much to drink on one occasion and she criticized 'it was Emperor's mistake when he treated Saigu coldly.' as her oracle in 1031.

sen.j: このため、伊勢神宮・賀茂神社の祭祀を天皇家が怠ってないことを表明するため、天皇実娘を斎宮、斎院に任命したとする説が近年有力である。
sen.e: Due to above, in recent years there was strong theory that Emperor's daughter was appointed to Saigu and Sai-in (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines) to prove Imperial family did not neglect the religious serviceIse of Jingu Shrine and Kamo-jinja Shrine.

sen.j: 寛徳2年（1045年）正月に父・後朱雀天皇の退位により退下。
sen.e: In New Year of 1045, she resigned from Saigu due to her father's abdication from the throne.

sen.j: その後は母・禎子内親王の下で生活していたが、天喜5年（1057年）、3歳年下の源俊房と密通し、遂に俊房の屋敷へ駆け落ちしてしまった。
sen.e: After that she lived with her mother, Imperial Princess Teishi, but she had an affair with MINAMOTO no Toshifusa who was three years younger than her, and finally she eloped to Toshifusa's house.

sen.j: 俊房は伯母隆姫女王が藤原頼通の正妻、母は頼通の異母妹藤原尊子という「摂関家よりの人物」であり、これを知った弟の東宮尊仁親王（後の後三条天皇）は怒り狂ったが、俊房が摂関家の縁者であることもあり、除位などの具体的な処罰までには至らなかった。
sen.e: Since Toshifusa's aunt, Princess Takahime was FUJIWARA no Yorimichi's wife and his mother was Yorimichi's half younger sister, FUJIWARA no Takako (Sonshi), and Toshifusa was person who was on 'Sekkan-ke (the families which produced regents) side', so his younger brother, Crown Prince Imperial Prince Takahito was furious after knowing above incident, but Toshifusa did not get practical punishment to lose his official position since he was the relative of Sekkan-ke.

sen.cmt: 俊房が処罰を受けなかったのではなく、娟子が受けなかった、と解釈しました。

sen.j: しかしこの事件で皇女らしからぬ軽率な行動をとった娟子内親王は、その後狂斎院と呼ばれるようになる。
sen.e: However Imperial Princess Kenshi, who acted without much consideration of her position as Princess, was called 後狂斎院.

sen.j: 俊房との間には子女に恵まれなかったが、その後は俊房正室として厚く遇された。

sen.j: しかし、甥の白河天皇が即位すると、「後三条天皇の遺言」を盾に白河天皇の異母弟・実仁親王 (平安時代)、輔仁親王を東宮に推す夫・俊房と、自分の子孫を天皇に据えたい白河天皇は次第に対立するようになる。
sen.e: However after his nephew, Emperor Shirakawa succeeded to the throne, there was conflict started to built up between husband, Toshifusa, who took advantage of 'Emperor Gosanjo's will' and strongly recommend Emperor Shirakawa's half younger brother, Imperial Prince Sanehito (Heian period) and Imperial Prince Sukehito to become Crown Prince, and Emperor Shirakawa who wish to let his grandchild to succeed to the throne.
